result.eng: It would better to stay out of view.
result.html: B'fhearr fanacht as amharcIt would better to stay out of view.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟearr fanaċt as aṁarcIt would better to stay out of view.

result.eng: The less money they have the better.
result.ga: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearr
result.orig: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearr
result.html: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearrThe less money they have the better.
result.ponchtml: Dá laġad airgead atá acu is ea is fearrThe less money they have the better.

result.eng: The more words you use the better.
result.ga: Dá liacht focal a úsáideann tú is ea is fearr
result.orig: Dá liacht focal a úsáideann tú is ea is fearr
result.html: Dá liacht focal a úsáideann tú is ea is fearrThe more words you use the better.
result.ponchtml: Dá liaċt focal a úsáideann tú is ea is fearrThe more words you use the better.

result.eng: The bigger it is the better.
result.ga: Dá mhéad é is ea is fearr
result.orig: Dá mhéad é is ea is fearr
result.html: Dá mhéad é is ea is fearrThe bigger it is the better.
result.ponchtml: Dá ṁéad é is ea is fearrThe bigger it is the better.

result.eng: It is getting better all the time.
result.ga: Tá sé ag dul i bhfeabhas an t-am ar fad
result.orig: Tá sé ag dul i bhfeabhas an t-am ar fad
result.html: Tá sé ag dul i bhfeabhas an t-am ar fadIt is getting better all the time.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag dul i ḃfeaḃas an t-am ar fadIt is getting better all the time.

result.eng: I am better now but I have a pain at times.
result.ga: Tá mé níos fearr anois ach bíonn pian orm uaireanta
result.orig: Tá mé níos fearr anois ach bíonn pian orm uaireanta
result.html: Tá mé níos fearr anois ach bíonn pian orm uaireantaI am better now but I have a pain at times.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé níos fearr anois aċ bíonn pian orm uaireantaI am better now but I have a pain at times.

result.eng: Well, I hope that you will feel better soon.
result.ga: Bhuel tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luath
result.orig: Bhuel tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luath
result.html: Bhuel tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luathWell, I hope that you will feel better soon.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuel tá súil agam go mbeiḋ biseaċ ort go luaṫWell, I hope that you will feel better soon.

result.ga: Tá mé i bhfad níos fearr
result.orig: Tá mé i bhfad níos fearr
result.html: Tá mé i bhfad níos fearrI am much better.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i ḃfad níos fearrI am much better.

result.eng: I hope you get better soon.
result.ga: Tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luath
result.orig: Tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luath
result.html: Tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luathI hope you get better soon.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam go mbeiḋ biseaċ ort go luaṫI hope you get better soon.

result.eng: I get on better with my father than with my mother.
result.ga: Réitím níos fearr le m'athair ná le mo mháthair
result.orig: Réitím níos fearr le m'athair ná le mo mháthair
result.html: Réitím níos fearr le m'athair ná le mo mháthairI get on better with my father than with my mother.
result.ponchtml: Réitím níos fearr le m'aṫair ná le mo ṁáṫairI get on better with my father than with my mother.

result.eng: I makes the page look a lot better if it is a little mode colourful than that.
result.ga: Cuireann sé go mór le maise an leathanaigh má bhíonn sé beagáinín níos dathúla ná sin
result.orig: Cuireann sé go mór le maise an leathanaigh má bhíonn sé beagáinín níos dathúla ná sin
result.html: Cuireann sé go mór le maise an leathanaigh má bhíonn sé beagáinín níos dathúla ná sinI makes the page look a lot better if it is a little mode colourful than that.
result.ponchtml: Cuireann sé go mór le maise an leaṫanaiġ má ḃíonn sé beagáinín níos daṫúla ná sinI makes the page look a lot better if it is a little mode colourful than that.

result.eng: A microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ga: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.orig: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.html: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadhA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ponchtml: Seans gur fearr a ḟóireann seirḃís ṁicreaḃlagála dá ċineál don duine gnóṫaċ atá ag iarraiḋ tuairimí a noċtaḋA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
